scenario.name: Simple UA Registeration IMS
scenario.send:
REGISTER sip:192.168.1.21;transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Contact: <sip:mcptt_c1@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:[field0]> From: <sip:[field0]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER User-Agent: MCPTT-UA Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,OPTIONS,NOTIFY,SUBSCRIBE,INFO,MESSAGE,REFER Content-Type: application/vnd.3gpp.mcptt-info+xml Content-Length: [len]
